nodes.short_description: Bowling Blitz is a VR bowling game on Meta Quest with realistic physics, skill-based shots, multiplayer party matches, and a leaderboard. Hangout and play with friends (1-4) in private rooms via invite or room code, or go 1v1 head-to-head. Bowl across 9 themed alleys plus 3 power-up bowling arenas. Take on Challenge Mode with obstacle-lane challenges, chase strikes, strike streaks, high scores, and climb the leaderboard toward a perfect game with boosters and power-ups.

Bowling Blitz ist VR-Bowling auf Meta Quest mit realistischer Physik, skillbasierten Würfen, Party-Mehrspieler + Hangout und Rangliste. Spielt mit Freunden (1–4) in privaten Räumen per Einladung oder Raumcode oder im 1v1 Kopf-an-Kopf. 9 Themen-Bahnen + 3 Power-up-Arenen. Challenge-Modus mit Hindernissen: Strikes, Serien, Highscores und perfektes Spiel.

Bowling Blitz è boliche in VR su Meta Quest con fisica realistica, tiri basati sull’abilità, multiplayer party + Hangout e classifica. Gioca con gli amici (1–4) in stanze private via invito o codice stanza, oppure in 1v1 testa a testa. 9 piste a tema + 3 arene power-up. Modalità Sfida con ostacoli: strike, serie, record e partita perfetta.

Bowling Blitz — VR-боулинг на Meta Quest с реалистичной физикой, бросками по мастерству, мультиплеером для компании + Hangout и таблицей лидеров. Играй с друзьями (1–4) в приватных комнатах по приглашению или коду, или выходи в 1v1 лицом к лицу. 9 тематических дорожек + 3 арены с power-up. Режим испытаний с препятствиями: страйки, серии, рекорды и идеальная игра.

Bowling Blitz est un bowling VR sur Meta Quest avec physique réaliste, tirs basés sur le skill, multijoueur party + Hangout et classement. Joue avec tes amis (1–4) en salon privé via invitation ou code de salle, ou en 1v1. 9 pistes à thème + 3 arènes power-up. Mode Défi avec obstacles : strikes, séries, records et partie parfaite.

Bowling Blitz es bolos en VR en Meta Quest con física realista, tiros basados en habilidad, multijugador tipo party + Hangout y clasificación. Juega con amigos (1–4) en salas privadas por invitación o código de sala, o en 1v1 cara a cara. 9 pistas temáticas + 3 arenas con power-ups. Modo Desafío con obstáculos: strikes, rachas, récords y partida perfecta.

Bowling Blitz é boliche em VR no Meta Quest com física realista, jogadas baseadas em habilidade, multiplayer estilo party + Hangout e placar de líderes. Jogue com amigos (1–4) em salas privadas por convite ou código da sala, ou em 1v1 frente a frente. 9 pistas temáticas + 3 arenas com power-ups. Modo Desafio com obstáculos: strikes, sequências, recordes e jogo perfeito.

nodes.long_description:
Get ready for the ultimate VR bowling experience with *Bowling Blitz: Surprise Power*! Combining the classic thrill of bowling with vibrant party vibes, dynamic power-ups, and immersive environments, this game takes the fun to a whole new level. Whether you're testing your skills or enjoying a casual solo session, *Bowling Blitz* has something for everyone.  

**Key Features**  

- **Dynamic Power-Ups**: Elevate your gameplay with exciting power-ups like **Multiball**, **Speed Boost**, **Time Reversal**, and **Aim Assist**. Each power-up adds a strategic twist to your shots, creating unforgettable bowling moments.  
- **Immersive Environments**: Bowl in unique, themed alleys, each with its own distinct atmosphere. From the medieval grandeur of a **castle**, the serene glow of an **underwater restaurant**, the cozy buzz of an **office canteen**, to the lively energy of a **pub**, every environment brings its own flavor of fun.  
- **Intuitive VR Controls**: Designed for players of all skill levels, *Bowling Blitz* offers easy-to-learn controls that let you focus on the fun while immersing yourself in the action.  
- **Party-Themed Atmosphere**: Vibrant visuals, dynamic lighting, and energetic soundtracks bring a festive vibe to every game, making it more than just bowling—it’s a celebration.  

The party starts here. **Are you ready to roll?**
nodes.short_description: Step into a vibrant VR world of fun, competition, and party vibes! Bowl in dynamic environments like a medieval castle, glowing underwater restaurant, lively pub, or bustling office canteen. Use thrilling power-ups like Multiball and Speed Boost to outscore opponents. Enjoy multiplayer action, unlock achievements, and climb the leaderboards. With intuitive controls and exciting gameplay, Bowling Blitz: Surprise Power is the ultimate VR party game. Are you ready t
